zachary.shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • zachary.shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line, RegularPolygon, Shape2D

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class provides definitions for double precision geometric shapes.
    Version:
    10/9/18 good style, good comments lots of constructors no way to change stroke color or fill color later need javadoc for protected fields need javadoc for abstract methods
    Author:
    Zachary Wang

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double x
      x coordinate of the shape
      protected double y
      y coordinate of the shape

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape(double x, double y)
      This creates a Shape object with x coordinate x and y coordinate y
      Shape(double x, double y, int strokeWeight)
      This creates a Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, and a certain line thickness
      Shape(double x, double y, int[] stroke)
      This creates a Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, and a certain line color
      Shape(double x, double y, int[] stroke, int strokeWeight)
      This creates a Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, a certain line thickness, and a certain line color

      • x

        protected double x
        x coordinate of the shape

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y)
        This creates a Shape object with x coordinate x and y coordinate y
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the shape
        y - y coordinate of the shape

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y,
             int[] stroke)
        This creates a Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, and a certain line color
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the shape
        y - y coordinate of the shape
        stroke - the color of the line
        Precondition:
        stroke is an array of size 3 with red in the first index, blue in the second, and green in the third

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y,
             int strokeWeight)
        This creates a Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, and a certain line thickness
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the shape
        y - y coordinate of the shape
        strokeWeight - the thickness of the line
        Precondition:
        strokeWeight can not be negative

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y,
             int[] stroke,
             int strokeWeight)
        This creates a Shape object with x coordinate x, y coordinate y, a certain line thickness, and a certain line color
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the shape
        y - y coordinate of the shape
        stroke - the color of the line
        strokeWeight - the thickness of the line
        Precondition:
        stroke is an array of size 3 with red in the first index, blue in the second, and green in the third, strokeWeight can not be negative

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
        Prepares the line thickness and color of the shape
        Parameters:
        p - the reference of the PApplet used
        Precondition:
        p must not be null, and appropriate settings should have been selected (color, fill, etc)
